trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> types to UI Automation.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
The element associated with this automation peer.
Minimizes the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>.
This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> property to `true`.
Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified item.
An object that is in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer"></xref> that is associated with the specified item.
Restores the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>.
This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.IsMinimized%2A> property to `false`.
Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
The state of the control that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.Tab"></xref> enumeration value.

Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore%2A> method returns a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> objects that represent the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.ApplicationMenu%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon.QuickAccessToolBar%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab> objects that belong to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
The child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName"></xref>.
The type name of the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>.
Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref>.
A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
If the property of the is `false` and patternInterface is the , , , or value, this method returns an object that supports the control pattern; otherwise, `null`.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer"></xref> is off the screen.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> is collapsed; otherwise, `false`.
This API is not implemented.
Gets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> allows more than one child element to be selected concurrently.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
`false` in all cases.
Gets a value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> requires at least one child element to be selected.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionProvider> interface.
`true` in all cases.
